bill.summary:
Supports the goals and ideals of World Habitat Day.
Recognizes the importance of establishing housing and shelter issues as a major priority of U.S. foreign assistance.
Urges an increased effort and the investment of greater resources by all relevant federal departments and agencies toward providing safe, simple, and decent housing, clean water, and sanitation for the poor.
Commends the actions of governments, international organizations, and charities around the world working to make shelter a priority.
